material_linear_advance_factor.label: Linear Advance Factor
material_linear_advance_factor.description: Sets the advance extrusion factors for Linear Advance. Setting it to 0 instructs Marlin to not apply any linear advance compensation.

material_linear_advance_factor_infill.label: Infill Linear Advance Factor
material_linear_advance_factor_infill.description: The Linear Advance Factor with which infill is printed.

material_linear_advance_factor_wall.label: Wall Linear Advance Factor
material_linear_advance_factor_wall.description: The Linear Advance Factor with which the walls are printed.

material_linear_advance_factor_wall_0.label: Outer Wall Linear Advance Factor
material_linear_advance_factor_wall_0.description: The Linear Advance Factor with which the outermost walls are printed.

material_linear_advance_factor_wall_x.label: Inner Wall Linear Advance Factor
material_linear_advance_factor_wall_x.description: The Linear Advance Factor with which all inner walls are printed.

material_linear_advance_factor_topbottom.label: Top/Bottom Skin Linear Advance Factor
material_linear_advance_factor_topbottom.description: The Linear Advance Factor with which top/bottom skin layers are printed.

material_linear_advance_factor_support.label: Support Linear Advance Factor
material_linear_advance_factor_support.description: The Linear Advance Factor with which the support structure is printed.

material_linear_advance_factor_support_i.label: Support Interface Linear Advance Factor
material_linear_advance_factor_support_i.description: The Linear Advance Factor with which the roofs and floors of support are printed.

material_linear_advance_factor_prime_tow.label: Prime Tower Linear Advance Factor
material_linear_advance_factor_prime_tow.description: The Linear Advance Factor with which the prime tower is printed.

material_linear_advance_factor_skirt_bri.label: Skirt/Brim Linear Advance Factor
material_linear_advance_factor_skirt_bri.description: The Linear Advance Factor with which the skirt and brim are printed.
material_linear_advance_factor_skirt_bri.enabled: resolveOrValue('adhesion_type') == 'skirt' or resolveOrValue('adhesion_type') == 'brim' or resolveOrValue('draft_shield_enabled') or resolveOrValue('ooze_shield_enabled')
